revised_title: The Existence of Nerves in the Placenta
tldr: The author, Everard Home, discovered the existence of nerves in both the foetal and maternal portions of the placenta. This discovery led him to infer the powerful influence of these nerves on the fetus in utero and the potential impact of the mother's bodily and mental affections on the child.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Developmental Biology
